survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Wireless Earbuds Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and buying behaviors related to wireless earbuds, including features, price sensitivity, and brand loyalty.

questions.question_text: Which of the following brands of wireless earbuds have you used in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow for multiple selections. Include 'Other' with an open-ended option for unspecified brands.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' text input option.

script.question_text: Which of the following brands of wireless earbuds have you used in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How important is battery life when choosing wireless earbuds?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a Likert scale to measure importance.

script.question_text: How important is battery life when choosing wireless earbuds?

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a pair of wireless earbuds?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined price ranges to simplify analysis.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a pair of wireless earbuds?

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting wireless earbuds? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a maximum selection limit of 3 options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting wireless earbuds? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future wireless earbuds?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future wireless earbuds?
